name: 3D Golf
description: This project is part of the Product Development and Coding training on Skilvul #Tech4Impact program implemented by Skilvul, for Kampus Merdeka program held by Kementerian Pendidikan, Kebudayaan, Riset, dan Teknologi Republik Indonesia. Pendidikan is the Challenge Partner. I am not working for nor contracted professionally by Pendidikan .
